gmx:scope.gco:CharacterString: Implementation of Annex B of AGeoP-08

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Bibliographic form of ISO 639-2 3-character codes
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Language code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: The dominant and official language of Albania.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Albanian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Bulgarian is the official language of Bulgaria.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Bulgarian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Czech is an official language in Czech Republic.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Czech

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Danish is the official language of Denmark
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Danish

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Dutch is the official language of Netherlands. It is also an official language in Belgium.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Dutch (Flemish)

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: English is the de facto official language in United Kingdom. It is also an official language in Canada and NATO. It is the official language of at least 28 states in United States where it is the de facto language of American government and the sole language spoken at home by 80% of the Americans age five and older.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: English

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Estonian is the official language in Estonia.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Estonian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: French is the official Language in France. It is also an official language in Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg and NATO.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: French

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: German is the official language of Germany. It is also an official language in Belgium and Luxembourg.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: German

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Greek is the official language in Greece.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Greek, Modern (1453-)

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Croatian is the official language in Croatia.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Croatian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Hungarian is the official language in Hungary.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Hungarian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Icelandic is the de facto official language in Iceland.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Icelandic

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Italian is the de facto official language in Italy.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Italian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Latvian is the official language in Latvia.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Latvian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Lithuanian is the official language in Lithuania.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Lithuanian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Luxembourgish is the de jure official language in Luxembourg.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Luxembourgish (Letzeburgesch)

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Norwegian is the official language in Norway.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Norwegian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Polish is the official language in Poland.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Polish

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Portuguese is the official language in Portugal.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Portuguese

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Romanian is the official language at the national level (other official languages, such as Hungarian or German are official at a local level) in Romania.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Romanian (Moldavian/Moldovan)

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Slovak is the official language in Slovakia. It is also an official language in Czech Republic.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Slovak

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Slovenian is the official language in Slovenia (Italian and Hungarian are also official languages in the residential areas of the Italian and Hungarian national community).
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Slovenian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Spanish is the national official language in Spain (other official languages exist at local level.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Spanish (Castillan)

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Turkish is the national official language in Turkey.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Turkish

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Name of the character coding standard used for the resource
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Character set code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: 16-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: 2 byte fixed UCS

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: 32-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: 4 byte fixed UCS

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: 7-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: UCS Transformation Format – 7 bits

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Character Set defined by IETF RFC 3629
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: UCS Transformation Format – 8 bits

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: UCS Transformation Format – 16 bits

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 1: Latin alphabet No. 1
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-1

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 2: Latin alphabet No. 2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-2

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 3: Latin alphabet No. 3
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-3

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 4: Latin alphabet No. 4
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-4

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 5: Latin/Cyrillic alphabet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-5

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 6: Latin/Arabic alphabet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-6

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 7: Latin/Greek alphabet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-7

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 8: Latin/Hebrew alphabet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-8

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 9: Latin alphabet No. 5
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-9

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 10: Latin alphabet No. 6
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-10

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 11: Latin/Thai alphabet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-11

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 13: Latin alphabet No. 7
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-13

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 14: Latin alphabet No. 8 (Celtic)
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-14

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 15: Latin alphabet No. 9
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-15

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Information technology – 8-bit single-byte coded graphic character sets – Part 15: Part 16: Latin alphabet No. 10
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ISO/IEC 8859-16

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Japanese code set used for electronic transmission
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: JIS

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Japanese code set used on MS-DOS based machines
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Shift JIS

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Japanese code set used on UNIX based machines
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: EUC JAPAN

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: United states ASCII code set (ISO 646 US)
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: US ASCII

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Ibm mainframe code set
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: EBCDIC

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Korean code set
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: EUC KOREA

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Traditional Chinese code set used in Taiwan, Hong Kong of China and other areas
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: BIG5

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Simplified Chinese code set
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: GB2312

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Categorisation of resolution bands of digital geospatial information (including imagery) by equivalence to paper map scales.
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Data Level Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 0 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 0

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 1 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 1

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 2 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 2

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 3 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 3

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 4 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 4

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Level 5 of Geospatial Information as defined in MC 0296/2
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Data Level 5

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Level of georeferencing of digital geographic information
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Georeferencing Level Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: No geographic location information is supplied. Examples: sketch
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ungeoreferenced

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Available with external geographic location information. Examples: raw image with auxiliary data like control points and/or sensor parameters
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Georeferenceable

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Processed to include geographic location information. Examples: GeoTIFF image, terrain elevation model, vector database in WGS84
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Georeferenced

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Georeferenced and corrected for positional displacement with respect to the surface of the earth. Examples: orthophoto
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Orthorectified

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Orthorectified and corrected for positional displacement with respect to the geometric properties of the features. Examples: an ortho image where pixels corresponding to bridges or buildings have been corrected to take into account the difference of elevation with the ground
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: True orthorectified

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Categorisation of geospatial information
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Geospatial Information Type Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Interpreted graphical abstraction of the geometric and semantic situation for a particular often rectangular part of the Earth’s surface using a symbolic signature defined in a legend with marginalia being part of the grap. Examples: scanned topographic map, rendered feature data as a topographic or thematic map
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Map Sheet

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Interpreted graphical abstraction of the geometric and semantic situation for a particular often rectangular part of the Earth’s surface using a symbolic signature defined in a legend where marginalia have been cropped from the map to build a seamless mosaic of map sheets without the marginalia. Examples: scanned and Georeferenced topographic maps building a mosaic of more than one sheet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Map Coverage

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Mathematical representation of heights of the terrain above a reference surface. Examples: DTED or LIDAR measurements
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Elevation Model

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Overlay of annotations and rendered features in a specific transparent symbology to Orthorectified imagery
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Image Map

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: geographical directory of information about places and place names
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Gazetteer

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Matrix of pixel values as they are delivered as raw data from a sensor
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw Image

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Georectified image files seamlessly covering an area of interest
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Image Coverage

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Structured data representing geospatial features. The geometrical aspect of the features is represented using point, line, or area geometric primitives which don’t provide a full 3D representation of the real world (e.g., buildings may be represented by an area geometric primitive, possibly with vertices having 2 or 3 spatial coordinates, corresponding to the border of their roof).
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vector 2D

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Structured data representing geospatial features. The geometrical aspect of the features is represented using point, line, area and solid geometric primitives providing a 3D representation of the real world (e.g., buildings may be represented by set of primitives and typically solids, describing their shape in more or less details).
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vector 3D

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Codes defining whether the geospatial information is analogue or digital
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Representation Form Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data represented as continuous values. The focus is hardcopy, i.e., permanent reproduction, or copy, in the form of a physical object, of any media suitable for direct use by a person (in particular paper), of displayed or transmitted data. Magnetic tapes and diskettes are not hard copies and may contain either analogue or digital data. Examples: analogue photography, paper map..
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Analogue

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data represented as discrete (discontinuous) values. Examples: files in a designated geospatial format stored on a electro-magnetic or electro-optical device or transmitted through a computer network
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Digital

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Class of information to which the referencing entity applies
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Resource Type

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Identifiable collection of data.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Dataset

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A dataset series is a collection of spatial data that shares similar characteristics of theme, source date, resolution, and methodology. The exact definition of what constitutes a series entry will be determined by the data provider.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Dataset series

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Function performed by the resource
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Online Function

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Download

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Online information about the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Information

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Offline Access

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Online order process for obtaining the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Order

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Online search interface for seeking out information about the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Search

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Method used to represent geographic information in the dataset
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Spatial Representation Type Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Vector data is used to represent geographic data
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vector

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Grid data is used to represent geographic data
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Grid

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Textual or tabular data is used to represent geographic data
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Text table

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Triangulated irregular network
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: TIN

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Three-dimensional view formed by the intersecting homologous rays of an overlapping pair of images
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stereo model

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Scene from a video recording
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Video

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Thematic codes from baseline 2010-2 of DFDD
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Thematic Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the extraction of raw materials and the excavation of soil.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Extraction

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the production and/or processing of materials.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Fabrication and/or Processing

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are associated with agriculture.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Agriculture

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the production, transportation and distribution of energy, whereas energy is mostly electricity.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Power Supplies

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to any kind of communication.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Communication

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which support Concepts stored in the other industrial and services Group (01).
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Associated Support Structures

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are used to store, provide and to protect any kind of goods.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Storage and/or Provision

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the collection, storage, processing or recycling of waste.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Waste Management

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to settlements and buildings.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Habitats

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are associated with settlements or related to an urban area.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Settlements-associated

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to trade and/or economy.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Economic and/or Commercial

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to recreational activities of people.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Leisure

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to politics and/or which describe administrative issues.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Politics and/or Administration

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe scientific issues and/or Concepts which relate to education.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sciences and/or Education

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to cultures, population and its characteristics.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Cultural Context

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to land transportation based on rails.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Railways

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are related to road-like Concepts, mainly which can be used by wheeled vehicles.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Roads and/or Tracks

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to a guided transportation like a cableway or a teleferic.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Guided Transportation

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to any transportation on water.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Water-borne Transportation

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to transportation in the air.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Air Transportation

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to a restriction.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Restrictions

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to any kind of land transportation route crossing.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Crossings and/or Links

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which support Concepts stored in the other land transportation Group (03).
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Transportation-associated

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to and are essential to servicing spacecraft, enabling spacecraft to launch or re-enter, or transferring passengers or space cargo to or from spacecraft, including launch control centres and rocket assembly facilities.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Space Transportation

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the transport in networks, such as pipelines or channels, above or below surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Distribution Networks

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the coast and/or the littoral zones like beaches.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Coastal and/or Littoral Zones

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to ports, harbours and/or places where vessels can be moored.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ports and/or Harbours

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are used to describe the depths of waterbodies.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Depths

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the bottom of a waterbody.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nature of Seabed

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to constructions and production installations which are placed in the offshore area.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Offshore Constructions and/or Installations

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to tidal issues and/or to the currents of water.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Tides and/or Currents

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the navigation on sea.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Routes and/or Navigation

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to a hazard and/or an obstruction for navigation on sea.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Hazards and/or Obstructions

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to sea ice.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sea Ice

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are used to describe water zones where special actions and/or behaviours are restricted, regulated or permitted.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Regulated and/or Restricted Zones

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to waterbodies without tides.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Inland Waters

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the physical conditions of water, for example temperature or density.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Physics of Water

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the form (positions and heights) of the terrain surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Hypsography

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the earth’s surface and Concepts which relate to the shaping of land forms.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Geomorphology

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to rocks and rocks on and beneath the surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rocks

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the soil, which means to the upper layer of the surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Soils

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to raw materials and their deposits.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Natural Resources

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to volcanoes, earthquakes and/or other seismic occurrences on and beneath the surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seismology and/or Volcanology

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to glaciers and glacial phenomena.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Glaciers

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe anomalies in the gravity or magnetic field of earth or the fields themselves.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Anomalies

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the coverage of earth’s surface in a global perspective.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Global Earth Cover

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe the land use for agriculture.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Cultivated Land

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to areas that are uncultivated and that are usually covered with low growing grass-like vegetation.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rangeland

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to a tree or wood covered area.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Woodland

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to areas that are permanently or temporarily moist or covered by water.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Wetland

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe very dry regions.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Arid Areas

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to areas that are designated as special and/or restricted regions based on their natural characteristics.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Regions and/or Restricted Areas

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to animal organisms.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Fauna

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to members of the Plant Kingdom.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Flora

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to the official, legal or recognised boundary and/or designation of parts of earth’s surface.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Boundaries and/or Limits

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are used to designate official or legal properties abd/or which are used for surveying purposes.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Land-survey and/or Real Estate

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which define areas on land or water (including buildings, installations and equipment) and which are intended to be used either wholly or in part for the arrival, departure and surface movement of aircrafts/helicopters.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Aerodromes, Movement Surfaces and/or Lighting

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which contain information about defined regions in the air used for navigation under a specific authority.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Airspace and/or Routes

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe a collection of technical or other types of aids for the navigation and/or landing of aircrafts and specify geographical locations, that are either used for navigation or pose a danger to it.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: NAVAIDS, Landing Aids, Points and/or Obstacles

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which are used for services furnished to personnel and/or institutions concerned with flight operations, various Organisations and Authorities.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Services, Organisations and/or Timetables

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which describe series of predetermined manoeuvres for an aircraft, in order to perform a save landing or take-off.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Terminal Procedures

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to military installations and facilities and/or to operational structures.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Defensive and/or Operational Structures

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which define borders or zones of military used areas in which special restrictions are applied and/or which are of special interest for military purposes.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Restricted Areas and/or Boundaries

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts which relate to certain operations or special eventsfor military or security purposes.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Operations and/or Events

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts describing relatively stable weather phenomenas like wind conditions.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Weather Phenomena

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts describing climate conditions like temperature or precipitation.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Climate Conditions

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: This Subgroup consists of Concepts describing climate zones and/or regions with special climate conditions.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Climate Zones and/or Regions

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Reference Digital Geospatial Information Baseline (RDB) term was created by NATO Core GIS to define consistent Digital Geospatial Information Baselines from the perspective of data management responsibilities and level of exploitation.
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Baseline Level Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Strategic Digital Geospatial Information Baseline
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: SDB

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Operational Digital Geospatial Information Baseline. NOTE : exercice data is treated as odb according to NATO Core GIS SOP.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: ODB

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Local Digital Geospatial Information Baseline
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: LDB

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Designated Geospatial Information (Designated GI) refers to the group of standard series GI that has been authorized for use as a reference source in NATO operations.
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Designation Type Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: group of standard series GI that has been authorised for use as a reference source in NATO operations
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Designated GI

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: theatre specific geospatial resources released for use in theatre and usually generated in theatre
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Supplemented GI

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: geospatial resources that are neither designated nor declared supplemented GI
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other GI

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: For exercise only. Group of standard series GI that has been authorised for use as a reference source in NATO operations.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Exercise Designated GI

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: For exercise only. Theatre specific geospatial resources released for use in theatre and usually generated in theatre
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Exercise Supplemented GI

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: For exercise only. Geospatial resources that have are neither designated nor declared supplemented GI
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Exercise Other GI

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: status of the dataset or progress of a review
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Progress Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Production of the data has been completed. NOTE: Data produced, existing but not currently in NATO holdings
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Completed

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data has been stored in an offline storage facility
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Historical Archive

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is no longer relevant
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Obsolete

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is continually being updated
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: On going

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fixed date has been established upon or by which the data will be created or updated. NOTE: Production is planned (e.g., MGCP)
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Planned

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data needs to be generated or updated
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Required

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is currently in the process of being created. NOTE: data is not produced/completed
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Under development

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: The latest version/edition of the data is available
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Latest available

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: An older version/edition of the data is available. NOTE: Data has been updated, but the latest version/edition is not available yet
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Older available

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data produced, but not releasable
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Not releasable

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it is first produced
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Maintenance Frequency Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is repeatedly and frequently updated
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Continual

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated each day
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Daily

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated on a weekly basis
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Weekly

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated every two weeks
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Fortnightly

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated each month
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Monthly

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated every three months
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Quarterly

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated twice each year
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Biannually

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated every year
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Annually

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated as deemed necessary
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: As needed

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data is updated in intervals that are uneven in duration
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Irregular

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: There are no plans to update the data
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Not planned

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Frequency of maintenance for the data is not known
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Unknown

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Name of the handling restrictions
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Classification Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Available for general disclosure
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Unclassified

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Not for general disclosure
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Restricted

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Available for someone who can be entrusted with information
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Confidential

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Secret

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Of the highest secrecy
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: TopSecret

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Nato body codes also include 3-character country codes specified in STANAG 1059
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: NATO Body Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: North Atlantic Treaty Organization - alliance of countries from Europe and North America for defence and security
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: NATO

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: European Union
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Eu

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: European Union Force
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Eufor

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: International Security Assistance Force
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Isaf

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Kosovo Force
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Kfor

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Partnership for Peace - programme of practical bilateral cooperation between individual Partner countries and NATO
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pfp

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Mediterranean Dialogue - cooperation between NATO and Mediterranean Dialogue countries to build confidence through cooperation in security-related issues
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Md

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Istanbul Cooperation Initiative - bilateral security cooperation of countries of the broader Middle East region with NATO
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ici

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Releasibility codes also include Nato Body Codes and 3-character country codes specified in STANAG 1059
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Releasibility Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Releasable to the public
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Public

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Exercice
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Exercice

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Operation Active Endeavour
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: OAE

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Global Counter Terrorism Force
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: GCTF

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Partnership for Peace - Staff Element
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: PSE

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Government of the Islamic Republic Of Afghanistan
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: GIROA

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Operation Unified Protector
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: OUP

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: NATO Contact Countries
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: NCC

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Codes determining the nations or organizations which may or should have direct access to the resource presumably via GeoWeb services
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Accessibility Level Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value A of NGC Point Paper 8.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: NATO planning

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value B of NGC Point Paper 8.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: NATO led operations

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value C of NGC Point Paper 8, involving an agreement on political level
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Support to NATO efforts

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value D of NGC Point Paper 8.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Trusted IO/NGO

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value E of NGC Point Paper 8.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Public Release

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Corresponds to value Z of NGC Point Paper 8.
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Produced but not released

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Restriction Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Copyright

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Patent

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Produced or sold information awaiting a patent
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Patent Pending

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: A name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Trademark

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Formal permission to do something
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: License

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Intellectual Property Rights

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: Withheld from general circulation or disclosure
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Restricted

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: function performed by the responsible party
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Role Code

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party that supplies the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Resource Provider

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party that accepts accountability and responsibility for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Custodian

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who owns the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Owner

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who uses the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: User

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who distributes the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Distributor

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who created the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Originator

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Point Of Contact

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Principal Investigator

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Processor

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who published the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Publisher

gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who authored the resource
gmx:CodeDefinition.gml:name: Author

gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:description: Code of the bodies responsible for the maintenance
gmx:CodeListDictionary.gml:name: Custodian Code
